heading: Today
text: Patches of valley fog burning off to sun. Some high clouds south late.

heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly clear north, some high clouds south. Patchy fog.

heading: Tuesday
text: Some morning high clouds, then sunny, cooler.
temperature: 60s to near 70 north, low to mid 70s south

heading: Wednesday
text: Sunny, breezy. Much cooler.50s to low 60s
